fields.title: Grow Wealth from the Soil — Join Palm Crest 2 Agricultural Investment.
fields.description:
🌴 Palm Crest 2 – The Future-Proof Agricultural Investment
We Farm. You Earn.
Palm Crest 2 represents a groundbreaking opportunity for individuals and organizations seeking a secure, long-term, and sustainable investment. Nestled within over 3,000 acres of fertile land in Imeko-Afon, Ogun State, this innovative project merges real estate ownership with agricultural profitability, giving investors full control of their land while we handle the farming.
At Palm Crest, we cultivate F1 Tenera hybrid palm trees, known for producing up to 4x more oil per hectare than traditional crops. These trees begin to yield from the 4th year, generating steady annual income for the next 25–30 years. Investors enjoy passive earnings while we manage all planting, maintenance, harvesting, and processing activities.

🌍 Why Palm Crest?
🔹 Global Demand on the Rise
Palm oil is a powerhouse ingredient used across five major industries:
•	Pharmaceuticals – essential in drug formulations and therapeutic products
•	Food & Beverage – found in over 50% of packaged foods worldwide
•	Biofuels – a clean, renewable alternative to fossil fuels
•	Cosmetics & Personal Care – a key natural ingredient in the global beauty industry
•	Industrial Manufacturing – used in lubricants, detergents, paints, and adhesives
As global sustainability goals push industries toward renewable materials, palm oil’s market potential continues to grow — positioning your investment at the center of a thriving global demand.

💼 Investment Highlights
•	Land Ownership – Investors receive titled land backed by a Certificate of Occupancy (C of O).
•	Fully Managed Plantation – We handle everything from cultivation to sales.
•	High Yield Returns – Begin earning from the 4th year of investment.
•	Long-Term Passive Income – Continuous returns for 25–30 years.
•	No Hidden Fees – Management and maintenance costs are covered by a 20% revenue deduction post-harvest.
•	Regular Updates – Weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly progress reports plus annual performance reports.
•	Project Visits – Investors can visit anytime or join quarterly guided tours.

📍 Project Location
Off Afon Road, Imeko-Afon LGA, Ogun State, Nigeria.
A strategic agricultural hub with proximity to major transport corridors and export routes.

💰 Flexible Payment Plans
1 Acre Plan:
•	₦3,000,000 – ₦3,400,000 (spread over 12 months)
•	Initial Deposit: ₦1,000,000
1 Hectare Plan:
•	₦7,000,000 – ₦7,600,000 (spread over 12 months)
•	Initial Deposit: ₦2,000,000

🏆 Why Choose Palm Crest?
Palm Crest is more than an investment — it’s a movement toward agricultural transformation, job creation, and economic empowerment. By joining, you’re helping reduce Nigeria’s dependence on palm oil imports while building wealth through a sustainable and future-focused enterprise.

fields.title: IBILE City & Resort – A Smart Community for Modern Living & Sustainable Investment
fields.description:
🌴 IBILE CITY & RESORT – Live • Farm • Thrive
Welcome to IBILE City & Resort, a revolutionary 3,000-acre community where modern living meets sustainable agriculture. This innovative agrihood development is redefining real estate investment by combining residential comfort, productive farmland, and world-class recreational spaces — all in one integrated environment.
Located off Imota, Ikorodu, the estate is designed for forward-thinking Nigerians seeking to live, invest, and thrive in a balanced, future-ready community.
🏡 Residential Cluster – Live
Experience eco-friendly living with modern modular homes, smart security, and green energy systems. The residential cluster offers well-planned plots surrounded by a good road network, community gardens, and co-working hubs that promote connection and convenience.
Available Plot Sizes:
•	300 SQM – ₦1.38M
•	500 SQM – ₦2.3M
•	1 Acre – ₦13.8M
💰 Outright payment attracts up to 17.86% discount.

🌾 Agricultural Cluster – Farm
Join the future of agriculture through commercial organic farms, greenhouses, and vertical farming units that support sustainability and income generation.
Available Farmland Options:
•	1 Acre – ₦11M
•	2 Acres – ₦22M
•	5 Acres – ₦55M

Each subscription includes statutory fees, survey documentation, and access to processing and storage facilities.

🌳 Recreational Cluster – Thrive
The resort zone offers a luxurious retreat featuring swimming pools, wellness centers, sports fields, and picnic areas — all designed for relaxation and social engagement.
Enjoy monthly community events, from bonfires to workshops, fostering a vibrant, connected neighborhood.

🛡️ Why Choose IBILE City & Resort?
•	✅ Secure & Verified Title: Registered Survey, free from government acquisition
•	✅ Flexible Payment Plans: 0–8 months with 40% initial deposit
•	✅ High-Value Appreciation: Strategic location ensures strong ROI
•	✅ Fully Serviced Infrastructure: Gatehouse, fencing, earth road network, and drainage
•	✅ Community-Centered Living: Residential, agricultural, and leisure clusters integrated for a sustainable lifestyle

📜 Documentation & Allocation
Upon full payment, subscribers receive an Acknowledgement Letter, Contract of Sale, and Deed of Assignment.

Physical allocation is done instantly after statutory fees are cleared, with survey and documentation delivered on allocation day.

💡 Key Investment Advantages
•	3-in-1 opportunity: Live, Farm, and Earn
•	Perfect for homeowners, agripreneurs, and investors
•	Backed by ACE Real Estate Development Ltd (RC 1695202)
•	Transparent process with no hidden charges
\
📞 Contact Kam Luxury Nigeria
For all inquiries, site inspections, and payment assistance:
📍 59, Murtala Mohammed Way, Ebute-Metta, Lagos
📞 08053309281
🌐 kamluxurynigeria.com
📲 Instagram | Twitter | Facebook: @kamluxuryng


✨ Marketed exclusively by Kam Luxury Nigeria – Luxury Homes, Smart Investments.

fields.title: Discover Echelon Apartments – Premium Comfort, Smart Investment
fields.description:
🏙️ Echelon Apartments – Designed for Life, Built for the Future
Welcome to Echelon Apartments, where architecture meets aspiration. Located in the fast-growing Oribanwa axis of Lagos, Echelon redefines modern urban living with a blend of functionality, sophistication, and long-term investment value.

In a world where the idea of “home” keeps evolving, Echelon Apartments offers a bold response — spaces that inspire comfort, pride, and connection. Whether you’re seeking your first home or expanding your investment portfolio, this is a property designed to mirror your ambition and lifestyle.

🏡 Apartment Options
Echelon offers three distinct living spaces tailored to your needs and aspirations:
•	1-Bedroom Unit – Sleek, intimate, and perfect for singles or young couples seeking independence with style.
•	2-Bedroom Pro – Designed for creative professionals who love dynamic spaces and open flow.
•	2-Bedroom Max – Spacious and structured for families who value comfort, connection, and functionality.

✨ Premium Features & Facilities
Every detail at Echelon is crafted to deliver a seamless living experience:
•	Fully fitted kitchens
•	Water heaters in all units
•	Spacious parking area
•	Modern drainage system
•	Constant water supply
•	24/7 security with CCTV surveillance

📍 Why Oribanwa?
Oribanwa is one of Lagos’ fastest-growing residential hubs, combining urban accessibility with serene suburban living.
•	Close to major highways, schools, shopping districts, and business centers
•	Promising high value appreciation and strong return on investment
•	A location that’s smart, peaceful, and future-proof

💰 Pricing & Payment Plans
•	1-Bedroom Apartment: Starting from ₦53 Million
•	2-Bedroom Apartment: Starting from ₦73 Million

Secure your unit today with an initial deposit and spread the balance across 6 months.

No hidden charges, no red tape — just a clear path to homeownership.

🏗️ Investment Advantage
Whether you’re a homeowner or an investor, Echelon offers both lifestyle luxury and financial growth. As Oribanwa continues to expand, your investment appreciates alongside modern infrastructure and community development.

“Echelon is a winning move. Located in a rapidly developing area, the value trajectory is upward.”

📞 Contact Kam Luxury Nigeria – Authorized Marketer
For inspection, inquiries, and payment details:
📍 59, Murtala Mohammed Way, Ebute-Metta, Lagos
📞 08053309281
🌐 kamluxurynigeria.com
📲 Instagram | Twitter | Facebook: @kamluxuryng

✨ Marketed exclusively by Kam Luxury Nigeria – Luxury Homes, Smart Investments.

fields.title: Premium Comfort, Prime Location – Autograph Lagos Awaits You
fields.description:
🏙️ Autograph Lagos – Modern Living, Smart Investment
Address: 11 Baale Street, Ilasan-Ikate, Lekki, Lagos
Developer: Xymbolic Development Ltd
Property Type: Luxury 1 & 2-Bedroom Apartments (with BQ)

🌟 Overview
Autograph Lagos is not just another property development — it’s a strategically designed investment opportunity for forward-thinking investors. Located in one of Lagos’ most sought-after neighborhoods, Ilasan–Ikate, Lekki, it offers proximity to key business and entertainment districts including Lekki Phase 1, Victoria Island, and Ikoyi.
Whether you’re buying for personal use, long-term leasing, or short-term rental, Autograph Lagos is built to ensure maximum returns and hassle-free ownership through a suite of management and concierge services.

🏗️ Project Highlights
•	12 Units of 2-Bedroom Apartments with BQ
•	4 Units of 1-Bedroom Apartments
•	Project Duration: 18 Months
•	Land Title: Governor’s Consent
•	Delivery: Beginning from mid-2025

💡 Why Choose Autograph Lagos
•	Prime Location: Easily accessible from major hubs and landmarks including Nike Art Gallery, The Palms Mall, Elegushi Beach, and Lekki Conservation Centre.
•	Capital Growth: Positioned for strong appreciation thanks to its location and premium build quality.
•	Hands-Free Income: Optional property management and concierge services handle bookings, guests, and maintenance for you.
•	Low Operating Costs: Solar-powered central areas, energy-efficient systems, and centralized utilities reduce expenses.
•	Flexible Ownership: Multiple payment and ownership plans tailored to individual and group investors.

🏢 Features & Amenities
•	Elevator
•	Swimming Pool
•	Fully Equipped Gym
•	24/7 Power (Backup Diesel Generator)
•	Solar-Powered Central Areas
•	Concierge Service
•	CCTV Surveillance & 24-Hour Security
•	Ample Parking Space
•	Gas Reticulation System
•	Dedicated Transformer
•	Bio-Digester System
•	Facility Management Office

🏡 Apartment Details
2-Bedroom Apartment + BQ
•	Total Area: 107 sqm
•	Living Room: 36 sqm
•	Master Bedroom: 18 sqm
•	Bedroom: 14 sqm
•	Kitchen: 14 sqm
•	Bathrooms, BQ, and Terraces included
1-Bedroom Apartment
•	Designed for modern professionals and investors seeking premium shortlet appeal

💰 Pricing & Payment Plan
2-Bedroom Apartment + BQ – ₦170,000,000
•	Initial Deposit: ₦20,000,000
•	6-Month Plan: ₦19,800,000 per month
•	Infrastructure & Documentation Fee: 10% of purchase price
1-Bedroom Apartment – ₦100,000,000
•	Initial Deposit: ₦20,000,000
•	3-Month Plan: ₦10,000,000 per month
•	Infrastructure & Documentation Fee: 10% of purchase price

💵 Rental Income Potential
Regular Rent:
•	Average rent for similar 2-bed apartments in Ilasan: ₦4M–₦6M/year
•	Expected rent at Autograph Lagos: ₦5M+ per year
Shortlet Rentals:
•	₦90,000/day average booking rate
•	65% occupancy target
•	30% expenses
•	Estimated Net Rent: ₦14,308,500 per year
Autograph Lagos gives investors the flexibility to choose between steady long-term rent or high-yield shortlets.

🧾 Additional Information
•	Infrastructure & Documentation Fee: 10% of unit price (covers Deed of Assignment, Survey, and Handbook)
•	Maintenance: Handled by Facility Management; cost shared or borne by tenant depending on usage.
•	Refund Policy:
o	Within 3 months – 70% refund (30% admin charge)
o	4–6 months – 85% refund (15% admin charge)
o	After 6 months – No refund
•	Payment Default Penalties:
o	5% interest after 2 months of default
o	Upward price review after 3 months
o	Termination and 30% deduction after 6 months


📈 Investment Summary
•	Location Advantage: Minutes from major business districts and leisure spots
•	Quality & Design: Energy-efficient, modern architecture
•	Rental Versatility: High ROI potential via long or short-let models
•	Developer Reputation: Backed by Xymbolic Development Ltd — experts in luxury real estate investments
